skills.name: Raging Flames
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 9s] Knocks enemies in a small AOE in front of the character airborne, dealing 100% ATK of Physical DMG. Targets explode after a short period of time, dealing 1,888 Fire DMG and igniting other enemies. Ignited enemies receive 196 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 4.5s.

skills.name: Ignition
skills.description: For every enemy ignited, each attack deals an additional 41 Fire DMG. Stacks up to 5 times.
